self.title: CDISC Questionnaire ESS Test Name Terminology

name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire ESS Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Epworth Sleepiness Scale Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - In a car, while stopped for a few minutes in the traffic.
terms.preferredTerm: ESS - In a car, While Stopped for a Few Minutes in the Traffic
terms.submissionValue: ESS01-In Car Stopped Few Minutes Traffic
synonyms: ESS01-In Car Stopped Few Minutes Traffic

terms.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Lying down to rest in the afternoon when circumstances permit.
terms.preferredTerm: ESS - Lying Down to Rest in the Afternoon When Circumstances Permit
terms.submissionValue: ESS01-Lying Down to Rest In Afternoon
synonyms: ESS01-Lying Down to Rest In Afternoon

terms.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - As a passenger in a car for an hour without a break.
terms.preferredTerm: ESS - As a Passenger in a Car for an Hour Without a Break

terms.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting, inactive in a public place (e.g. a theatre or a meeting).
terms.preferredTerm: ESS - Sitting, Inactive in a Public Place
terms.submissionValue: ESS01-Sitting Inactive in a Public Place
synonyms: ESS01-Sitting Inactive in a Public Place

terms.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting quietly after a lunch without alcohol.
terms.preferredTerm: ESS - Sitting Quietly After a Lunch without Alcohol

terms.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting and reading.
Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting and talking to someone.
terms.preferredTerm: ESS - Sitting and Talking to Someone
